## MAXIMUM_BORROWING_RATE variable

Value that the [borrowing rate](./lib-base.fees.borrowingrate.md) will never exceed.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
MAXIMUM_BORROWING_RATE: Decimal;
```
